snippet: A former NFL player and his business partner have pleaded guilty in Boston to running a multimillion-dollar Ponzi scheme involving fraudulent loans to professional athletes....
lead_paragraph: A former NFL player and his business partner have pleaded guilty in Boston to running a multimillion-dollar Ponzi scheme involving fraudulent loans to professional athletes.

headline.main: Ex-NFL Player Pleads Guilty in Ponzi Scheme Worth Millions
headline.print_headline: Ex-NFL Player Pleads Guilty in Ponzi Scheme Worth Millions
